title: The most enraging thing that has happened to you in game
body:
Another fun boards activity. Put down what enraged you the most in game.

I'll start off:

I was most enraged when I got a Quadra with Talon but couldn't find the 5th player :^(

replies.body:
when i am support and the adc pings 1300 gold in a lane we are winning then comes back to lane with {{item:3086}} 

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vTu6Q2cUx-0/T6LgyzUTItI/AAAAAAAACZk/yynxm31SW-0/s640/flustered-my-jimbos.png

Last game, playing Zyra, and the enemy Nami tells me about the upcoming Zyra nerfs, i legit lost my appetite, afk'd and haven't been able to play since. 

I'm sick or the bullshit Riot, "oh but what are we supposed to do??" fucking leave her the fuck alone, buff other supports so they're not goddamn useless, and actually give a fuck about the people who put time and effort into the champs they play, give some fucking buffs in the right places, otherwise you're legit just making it harder to have a good game. 

Fucks sake Riot. 

And yeah, maybe a lil toxic, but i feel, under the circumstance, it's entirely necessary (I don't think the message would be truly conveyed by passive aggresive bullshit, I want you to feel it, like I feel it, I'M SICK...OF YOUR FUCKING SHIT.)

I'm here to enjoy myself, not be disgusted every time Riot brings out a new patch.

P.s. That feels when we finally had a support that could do something and be a fucking god, then Riot shits on it.

Middle fingers raised.

you can cmplain about zyra nerfs when you all stop complaining about yasuo even after his 6 patch nerf streak, of which he was fine before, the only different is now instead of feeding 80% of games its feeding 95% of games.

ANd the literal only different between now and what her nerf will be is that they wont focus champions right off the bat if you miss all your spells. You shouldnt get free 1/2 hp bar for missing everything. Most of her "feels when you finally had a support that could be a god" will be exactly the same, the only difference is you need to hit them with a spell or aa first, instead of missing every spell and still killing them.
TFW i jumped the gun, feelsbadman, my apologies Riot, you actually nailed this patch.....feels like i should at least come say something when u get it right, SORRY GUYS

probably getting "attemping to reconect..." just before a decisive teamfight.
the reports are ensured :/
yeah or when you are winning but then you have a statewide blackout during your promo game and you know you're going to get reported for going afk midway through the game.
Playing supp with my duo as an adc, steamrolling the enemy bot, then still losing because mid and top went 0/12

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=u1WwlI3w,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-02-05T08:49:37.170+0000)
>
> Playing supp with my duo as an adc, steamrolling the enemy bot, then still losing because mid and top went 0/12

Mate I have that happen to me 90% of games I play. Normally I win my lanes without much trouble only to get face stomped out of lane pahse cos some utter noob has fed mid lane or top. It's quite pathetic.

Infact, I got so sick of other lanes feeding I decided to play top lane (1st game top in about 6-7 months). Won my lane easily without giving over a single kill and outfarmed the enemy top. I was also up 3 kills on their top lane. Only to find my bot lane is getting fucking rekt! I'm talking 1-11 rekt.

No matter what you do, no matter how well you win your lane or play the game. It's honestly about pure luck in regards to MM. You can't possibly carry a 1v5 when other lanes feed the enemy upwards of 5-10 kills each.

That's why I HATE this game so much. Ranked is all about luck and takes nothing into account in regards to personal performance.

throughout my years, penta steal via 1 auto attack
penta steal via jinx ult (GODAMIT JINX EVEN THOUGH I WAS DEAD AS SION, I HAD FROZEN MALLET HIT ON HIM, AND I HAD CLEAVER)
xin zhao support not support item all ks and cs no exhaust or supporting of any kind + flaming
flamed at for not getting sightstone and getting face to protect adc (id rather protect from a gank then be a bitch when i see one coming)
having a bard on my team

I simply played League. As funny as that sounds this game is the most rage inducing trash I've ever come across. Like I actually find the game shit, boring, pathetic and doesn't satisfy me in any way. Yet I still play it for some reason. It's like I enjoy giving myself cancer and pissing myself off.

I need therapy :P

>
> I simply played League. As funny as that sounds this game is the most rage inducing trash I've ever come across. Like I actually find the game shit, boring, pathetic and doesn't satisfy me in any way. Yet I still play it for some reason. It's like I enjoy giving myself cancer and pissing myself off.
> 
> I need therapy :P

That is called an addiction. And yes if that is really an addiction, you would really need help to cope with that.

Outside of the dickery that is LoL gameplay chat,

I've had these things that I just absolutely despise:

* Ping spike in convenient times, ie, before the start of any critical engagement for one.
* I think my client is bugged or something, because I also always lag spike the instant just before my first death in any match, always. Sure it means nothing really since the chances of pulling a comeback the instant just before you die is minuscule to begin with, and it only happens for my first death of the game, but nonetheless still very infuriating to see.
* People doing instalock (in norms), afk and intentional feeding all at the same time. I don't get why some people do that, but there are people who're so bored they actually do that shit in game. A waste of everybody's time.
* Seeing Lee Sin on my opponents' team.

Back at the start of the year in 2016 I used to main Nasus, Vayne and Ekko. I remember some of my first moments as Ekko, in which I struggled to get a penta with him. I probably got about 5 or 6 quadras but could never pull off a penta kill.

But the most enfuriating one was easily when I pretty much 1v4ed the enemy team, pulling off a sick ult bait. Of course, I head straight for the 5th player, who is willing to give me the penta, but just as I'm about to get it, my fucking team surrenders. Like, wtf???

It was almost matched when I got a quadrakill as MF with one good ult, and then a Taliyah auto attacked to steal my penta. That shit does like 50 dmg smh.
